full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL BA TSE DPAG MED KYI SGRUB THABS DANG RJES GNANG GI CHO GA BKLAGS PAS DON GRUB CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES RGYAL BA TSE DPAG MED KYI SGRUB THABS DANG RJES GNANG GI CHO GA BKLAGS PAS DON GRUB CES BYA BA 'DI NI, BLA MA DKON MCHOG GSUM LA GUS DANG LDAN PA @014B T'A BLA MA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG NYI MA DPON CHUNG GI BKA' GNANG SBYIN MA LDOG TE GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO, ,DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR BRTEN CING, ,RJE DAM PA DE NYID KYI BKA' 'DRIN GYIS NYE BAR 'TSO BA'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL SPRANG CHUNG SNYOM LAS PA SHI RI GE THU CHOS RJE BLO BZANG ZHI BAS RJE BLA MA GONG MA'I PHYAG LEN GYIS BRGYAN TE BSGRIGS PA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD RGYAL BA TSE DPAG MED KYI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: SHI RI GE THU CHOS RJE BLO BZANG ZHI BA,
